Contents.Content: SELECT pmi.Patient_id AS PatientCode ,pmi.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode ,pmi.Id_no AS PatientIDCard ,pmi.Patient_id AS SocialSecurityCard ,pmi.name AS PatientName ,pmi.sex AS PatientSex ,pmi.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday ,floor(months_between(sysdate,pmi.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge ,pmi.Mailing_address as PatientAddress ,NULL AS HighRiskInfectivity ,pih.patient_id as InPatientCode ,pih.Dept_code AS WardArea ,pih.Ward_Code AS InDepartment ,pih.Bed_no AS BedNumber FROM Pat_master_index pmi Left join pats_in_hospital pih on pih.Patient_id = pmi.Patient_id where 1=1 {0}

SELECT pib.IC_CARD_NO AS PatientCode ,pmi.Inp_no AS MedicalRecordCode ,pmi.Id_no AS PatientIDCard ,pmi.Patient_id AS SocialSecurityCard ,pmi.name AS PatientName ,pmi.sex AS PatientSex ,pmi.Date_of_birth AS PatientBirthday ,floor(months_between(sysdate,pmi.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge ,pmi.Mailing_address as PatientAddress ,NULL AS HighRiskInfectivity ,pih.patient_id as InPatientCode ,pih.Dept_code AS WardArea ,pih.Ward_Code AS InDepartment ,pih.Bed_no AS BedNumber FROM Pat_master_index pmi left join Pat_ICCARD_base pib on pib.MRID= pmi.patient_id Left join pats_in_hospital pih on pih.Patient_id = pmi.Patient_id where 1=1 {0}

SELECT pmi.Patient_id AS VALUE, pmi.Patient_id AS InPatientCode, pmi.name AS NAME, pmi.sex AS PatientSex, pmi.name AS DISPLAYNAME, pih.Ward_Code AS WardArea, floor(months_between(sysdate,pmi.Date_of_birth)/12) AS PatientAge, pih.Dept_code AS InDepartment, pih.Nursing_Class AS Nursing, pih.bed_no AS Bedno, NULL AS BedNurse, NULL AS InPatientDoctor FROM pats_in_hospital pih LEFT JOIN Pat_master_index pmi ON pih.Patient_id = pmi.Patient_id WHERE 1=1 {0}
